content:
I want to know all the actors and actresses born on the same day as my birthday. Can you provide me with a list?
Begin!

I apologize, but I noticed that you haven't specified your birthday (month and day) yet. To help you find actors and actresses born on your specific birthday, I'll need you to provide me with the month and day of your birth.

The function `actors_list_born_today_for_online_movie_database` requires two parameters:
1. `month` (an integer representing the month)
2. `day` (an integer representing the day of the month)

Could you please share your birthday in the format of month and day? For example, if you were born on July 27th, you would provide month as 7 and day as 27.

Once you give me those details, I'll be happy to retrieve the list of actors and actresses born on that day for you.

function.arguments: {"return_type": "give_answer", "final_answer": "Please provide your birthday's month and day so I can find the actors and actresses born on the same date."}
function.name: Finish
